name: node-slack-seed
description: Boilerplate to get started on node based Slack bots

SLACK_WEBHOOK.description: The slack incoming webhook url. This is from the integrations page

SLACK_CHANNEL.description: The slack channel to send notifications to (Do not ad #). NOTE: Setting this will override integration settings

BOT_USERNAME.description: The slack bot's username. NOTE: Setting this will override integration settings

BOT_EMOJI.description: The name of any available custom or default Emoji to be used for the bot icon

UPDATE_COLOR.description: Hex value for updates posted to Slack
